properties.Description: This old heritage home was built in 1865 and was converted into seven apartments retaining the original hardwood floors, crown molding, high ceilings and more. The building boasts all the charms from the past, nestled close to all the conveniences of downtown at an affordable price.

Albion-Heatherington is a family community within walking distance to schools and adjacent to a City of Ottawa park with recreation facilities. The community includes the Heatherington Community Centre and the Better Beginnings, Better Futures centre. Better Beginnings, Better Futures operates specialized programs and services for parents and young children.

The Arlington community is located close to the bus station on Catherine Street. This development has bright, spacious apartments with hardwood floors. All of the apartments have built-in desks and bookshelves. Air conditioners are included and are installed and removed seasonally. The one-bedrooms are loft style apartments. There is a bike room and an outside amenity area available for use by all tenants.
N/A

Located near La Cité Collégiale, this community features town houses, some of which have been specifically designed to be wheelchair accessible. It is close to Montreal Road and a short bus ride to the Gloucester Shopping Centre and restaurants on Ogilvie Road.

This community is located within walking distance to a large grocery store, and to shops and services on Rideau Street and in the Byward Market. Beauséjour is close to the Lowertown Community Resource Centre, Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, a Youth Centre and a Community House which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area. Several accessible units.

Bélisle is located close to the Overbrook and St. Laurent Community Centres, the Boys and Girls Club on McArthur Road and the Vanier Community Services Centre on Montreal Road. It is within walking distance to the shops on McArthur and St. Laurent Boulevard.

Blair Court community is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood between St. Laurent Boulevard and the Vanier Parkway. It is situated close to the Ottawa Hospital campus, shops, green space and the VIA Rail train station. It has an on-site Community House offering programs and services to residents.

This family townhouse community is located in Hunt Club with vast parkland, bicycle paths and a variety of recreational activities. It is a wonderful neighbourhood for families with children. Several accessible units.

Situated in the heart of downtown Ottawa, within walking distance to Bank Street, this location provides easy access to shops, services, recreation facilities, buses and the main branch of the Ottawa Public Library. There is no need for a car in this convenient site.

The Bronson Rooming House offers affordable lodging with free laundry facilities and is conveniently located on Bronson Avenue, near Catherine Street. It is situated close to shops, services and Carleton University. All rooms are furnished and equipped with cooking facilities. There is a large common room and an indoor bike room.

Brooke Towers is located in the Golden Triangle area, just steps away from Elgin Street and the Rideau Canal. This building offers all the amenities of downtown living. It has a community room and an outdoor patio, popular for tenant gatherings.
With a small park adjacent to the site, this community provides a wonderful home for families with children, all within steps of the Byward Market.

Caldwell is an established neighbourhood close to excellent shopping and within walking distance to the Experimental Farm, a City of Ottawa gymnasium and wading pool. A variety of programs and services are available on site at the Caldwell Family Centre Inc., Bellevue Community Centre and at the Carlington Community Chaplaincy / StrongHold Community Home. The community is also close to Duluth Arena, Carlington Park and has two playgrounds on site.
N/A
Located in Ottawa East near la Cité Collégiale, this development combines two sites; both are located near shopping, schools and green space.

Centrally located between Carling Avenue and Baseline Road, the Cavan-Lepage community is close to restaurants and shops on Merivale Road; a short bus ride to Westgate Shopping Centre and Hampton Park Plaza. This community has easy access to the Experimental Farm, many playgrounds, and a gym and wading pool at the Bellevue Community Centre.

Located in the family-oriented neighbourhood of Redwood Park, these townhouses have large bedrooms and include parking. The community is within walking distance to schools, parks, shopping at Pinecrest Mall and is a short bus ride to the Bayshore Shopping Centre. Easy access to the Queensway. Several accessible units.

Confederation Court is situated at the corner of Walkley and Russell Roads. It is close to public transportation and shops on Walkley Road. Schools are within walking distance of the community. A Community House is located in a converted double townhouse which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the community. Five-bedrooms are also available.

Located in the Byward Market, this community features a landscaped terrace and a recreation room within the building. Units are fully carpeted, have individual heat controls and en suite storage. This location puts you within minutes of Ottawa’s downtown and a few steps from the many conveniences of the Rideau Centre. Two accessible units.

This low rise apartment building is located one block south of McArthur Road; near a supermarket, stores on McArthur, and steps from the bus stop to shopping and restaurants at the St. Laurent Centre.

Located in a quiet, west-end neighbourhood, this townhouse community overlooks the Ottawa River Parkway. All units include a working electric fireplace. The community is situated close to Lincoln Heights Galleria, the Transitway, Carlingwood Mall, parks and schools.

Eva Taylor Court is situated in a family community, close to schools, walking trails and Britannia Park. It is located close to many amenities and services, including shopping and restaurants at Lincoln Fields Shopping Center. Lincoln Fields transit station is the main transit hub in the neighbourhood. Several accessible units.

Foster Farm is located adjacent to the Ramsey community, a mini-mall and close to Pinecrest Mall. The community is beside a baseball diamond and a Boys and Girls Club. There is an on site City of Ottawa Community Centre, Daycare Centre and a Community House. Five-bedrooms available.

The Friel buildings are located within walking distance to a large grocery store, and to shops and services on Rideau Street and in the Byward Market. The community is close to the Lowertown Community Resource Centre, Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, a Youth Centre and a Community House which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area.

This seniors’ building is located a few blocks west of Churchill Avenue on Richmond Road. It is close to Westboro stores, and a short bus ride to Carlingwood Mall. The Churchill Seniors Centre is nearby, and the community is not far from the Western Parkway recreational path along the Ottawa River.

Located in Hampton Park, this seniors’ building is close to shops and services and the Hampton Park Plaza. It is a short bus ride to Carlingwood Mall, Westgate Mall and the trendy shopping district of Westboro.

Built in 2016 the Hayley Court townhomes are located close Lees station. This new development is constructed on the foundations of an existing fire damaged structure that used to house 14 homes. This redesign adds 2 additional homes with a total of 10 additional bedrooms and a split level style concept with south / north frontage that maximizes sunlight and cross ventilation for increased tenant comfort. Two of the 3-bedroom townhouse layouts can be easily modified to increase the bedroom count by one (to a 4-bedroom) to accommodate the needs of a larger family. The homes are built to be highly energy efficient, using LED lighting and polished concrete radiant floor heating.

This apartment building is conveniently located close to all amenities. The Parkdale Market is situated just across the street with the Hintonburg Community Centre, parks, Wellington Street shops and restaurants all within walking distance. Several accessible units.
Located east of Conroy Road in Hunt Club Park, these spacious townhouses provide the perfect home for families with schools and parks nearby. Several accessible units.

This community has extremely spacious three and four-bedroom townhouses located in the Alta Vista area. It is close to shopping and schools, with transportation directly in front of the community. The homes feature hardwood floors throughout.

This lovely building is situated within a beautiful community near the river with ease of access to shopping, recreational facilities and parks. Shop on Montreal Road or take a short bus ride to the Rideau Centre and Byward Market. Several accessible units.

The Lebreton Flats community is located north-west of Centretown, in an area rich with character and history. The community faces the Canadian War Museum, Lebreton Flats and is within walking distance to the Ottawa River. This centrally located housing provides easy access to shopping, recreational facilities and public transportation. Several accessible units.

The Lexington community is situated on the banks of the Rideau River in old Ottawa South. It is within walking distance to the many shops, restaurants and services located in Old Ottawa South, the Glebe and Billings Bridge Plaza, with bus service close by.

This older 6 unit apartment building is located in New Edinburgh near the shops and restaurants on Beechwood and within walking distance to the beautiful New Edinburgh Park. Take a short bus ride to the Rideau Centre or the Byward Market.

MacLaren Towers is centrally located in the downtown core, close to shops, restaurants, services, public transportation, and within walking distance to the Canal. Tenants enjoy a newly landscaped courtyard terrace, a bicycle storage area and a large community room for tenant gatherings.

The May Nickson Place community features a small number of stacked townhouses adjacent to a modern apartment building in a downtown residential neighbourhood. Situated in the heart of Centretown, this community’s location provides easy access to shops, services, recreation facilities and buses. Several accessible units.

The Mayview community is located minutes from downtown Ottawa, yet far enough from the hustle and bustle of city life. This location offers proximity to shopping on Merivale Road, Westgate Shopping Centre and the Experimental Farm bike paths.

The McAuley Place community features a small number of townhouses surrounding an apartment building. Situated in the heart of downtown Ottawa, this community’s location provides easy access to shops, services, recreation facilities, buses and the main branch of the Ottawa Public Library.
Conveniently located, this four-storey apartment building is within walking distance of Billings Bridge Plaza, parks and many more amenities, in the south end of Ottawa. Several accessible units.

Michele Heights is located close to stores and restaurants on Carling Avenue, and to the Bayshore Shopping Centre and Britannia Odeon Cineplex. Adjacent to Michele Heights is a Community Centre with a playground and organized children’s activities. A Community House is located in a converted three-bedroom townhouse and offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the community.

The Mooretown Quads community is located between Merivale Road and Carling Avenue, off Fisher Avenue. The community is situated in a quiet, well-established residential neighbourhood with mature trees and parks. The neighbourhood is close to Merivale Road shopping, Westgate Shopping Mall, Hampton Park Plaza and the Experimental Farm.

The Mooretown Quads community is located between Merivale Road and Carling Avenue, off Fisher Avenue. The community is situated in a quiet, well-established residential neighbourhood with mature trees and parks. The neighbourhood is close to Merivale Road shopping, Westgate Shopping Mall, Hampton Park Plaza and the Experimental Farm.

The building is located within walking distance to a large grocery store, and to shops and services on Rideau Street and in the Byward Market. 380 Murray is very close to the Lowertown Community, Resource Centre , Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, a Youth Centre and a Community House which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area.

Approximately 35 km from Ottawa, in the rural setting of North Gower, this beautiful location for seniors is within 20 minutes of both Richmond and Kemptville. A daily bus provides transportation to various locations in Ottawa, including the Civic Hospital. North Gower has an on site community room.
properties.Address: 2363 Roger Stevens Drive, North Gower, Ontario, K0A 2T0

properties.Description: This development consists of 27 quadruplexes, each with four one-bedroom units scattered amongst family row house units. The community is conveniently located near St. Laurent Boulevard and within walking distance to St. Laurent Shopping Centre.

Located throughout Overbrook, these three and four-bedroom brick houses are within walking distance to St. Laurent Shopping Centre, parks, schools, and the Overbrook Community Centre. Rents for homes without subsidies are extremely affordable. Families with dependent children are given priority.
Conveniently situated between St Laurent Boulevard and the Vanier Parkway, this four-storey low rise apartment community is within walking distance to many stores, parks and has great bus service.
Pinecrest Terrace is located close to schools, playgrounds, shopping centres and Algonquin College. A Community House is located on site and offers programs and services to tenants.
Conveniently located near St. Laurent Boulevard, this walk-up apartment building has a garden courtyard. It is a short walk to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre, parks and bus service.

This community is one block north of Richmond Road, between Carling and the Ottawa Parkway. It is a short walk to Britannia Village, the Lincoln Heights Shopping Mall, the Pinecrest-Queensway Community Health Centre and an easy bus ride to the Bayshore Shopping Centre and Andrew Hayden Park.
This community features 15 three-bedroom homes, providing much-needed affordable housing for families. A green space and a playground are a part of the revitalized community.

This small development located in a well-established neighbourhood in the west end of Ottawa features units with fireplaces and 1.5 bathrooms. It is close to all amenities including parks, schools, shopping and buses.

Gladstone Terrace is located in the Italian community at the corner of Preston and Gladstone. It is an attractive building for seniors that offers shopping and dining nearby, with public transportation just steps away. Residents of the building have access to a large community room, outdoor patio with a seating area, on site exercise facility, a library room and a bright laundry room.

This community features charming townhouses that are spacious with an abundance of counter and cupboard space. Most of the townhouses have private fenced backyards. There is a community space and a tot lot on site. The community is located close to all the great restaurants of the Italian and Asian districts.

This recently built community offers bright, modern apartments with an open concept kitchen area and hardwood floors. There is a community space in the building with a tot lot on site. The community is located close to all the great restaurants of the Italian and Asian districts. Two accessible units.

The Cumberland Rooming House is just steps away from the University of Ottawa. It is in close proximity to the Rideau Centre, grocery stores, shops and bus services. Rooms are furnished and include kitchen facilities.
These bright townhouses are located in a quiet neighbourhood close to the Experimental Farm, bike paths, shopping, schools, parks and other amenities.

Russell Heights is situated west of St. Laurent Boulevard and north of Smyth Road. A Community House is located in a converted double (3 & 4 bedroom units) townhouse at 1799E Russell Road and offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the community.
N/A
The community is within walking distance to the Westboro shopping and restaurant district. The townhouses have finished basements and powder rooms. There is an on site play structure.

These multi-level townhouses, located in the popular Ottawa south Uplands area, have large decks and individual carports. The townhouses surround a central play area including a log cabin community building which was donated by the National Capital Commission. Accessible units available.
Located in Sandy Hill, this seniors’ building, within the Strathcona Heights Community, is close to many amenities, the Rideau River and the University of Ottawa. Accessible units available.

Somerset Towers is situated at the corner of Somerset Street West and Bank Street, conveniently located near the Centretown Community Health Centre. This downtown site provides easy access to all sorts of amenities such as public transportation, shopping and restaurants. The building is equipped with a spacious community room and has an outdoor patio with gardens and a seating area.

There are over 50 residents living in the Spadina Place community. Located in a well established residential area close to Wellington Street, this development features homes surrounding an amenity area with play space for children. Two of the one bedroom homes are accessible.

This community is one block north of Richmond Road, between Carling and the Ottawa Parkway. It is a short walk to Britannia Village, the Lincoln Heights Shopping Mall, the Pinecrest-Queensway Community Health Centre and an easy bus ride to the Bayshore Shopping Centre and Andrew Hayden Park.

These beautiful townhouses and stacked units in Strathcona Heights offer value and convenience within an outstanding community. Pathways, open space and play areas form an integral part of this development and are there for everyone to enjoy! Accessible units available.
These spacious apartment buildings are located in Sandy Hill and have been completely renovated and include hardwood floors. They offer value and convenience within an outstanding community.

This community is located one block north of Montreal Road at the Aviation Parkway. Shops and restaurants are within easy access on Montreal Road. It is also adjacent to National Capital Commission wooded green space.

Located between Hampton Park and Westboro, the Tweedsmuir townhouses surround a courtyard amenity area. The community is conveniently located close to Hampton Park Plaza, the vibrant shopping district in Westboro, schools, parks and the Dovercourt Community Centre.

Located between Hampton Park and Westboro, the Tweedsmuir townhouses surround a courtyard amenity area. The community is conveniently located close to Hampton Park Plaza, the vibrant shopping district in Westboro, schools, parks and the Dovercourt Community Centre.

Combining a mixture of apartment and bungalow housing, the Walkley Road community is situated in close proximity to shops, services and public transportation. Located on the south side of Walkley Road, the community includes a large lounge and outdoor patio space with swings. Programs and health services are available close by at the Heron Seniors’ Centre.

This community is located in the heart of Vanier, north of Montreal Road, between the Vanier Parkway and St. Laurent Blvd. It’s a small community, close to stores on Montreal Road and New Edinburgh. A short bus ride takes you to the St. Laurent Community Centre.

Woodland Place is located in Greenboro with numerous bicycle paths, schools, shopping and transportation nearby, making it a great community for families with children. South-East Ottawa Community Health Centre is just one of the partners serving this community. Some accessible units are available; fridge and stove included in these units only.

This centrally located rooming house offers affordable lodging with free laundry facilities. The Albert Rooming House community has great bus service and is situated close to shops and services. All rooms are furnished and equipped with cooking facilities.

The Allard Place community is located adjacent to Tunney’s Pasture and features a courtyard playground in addition to another smaller play area for children. It is within walking distance to Holland Cross, a public library, Parkdale Market, parks, Hintonburg Community Centre and Wellington Street shops. Several accessible units.

The Ashgrove community consists of townhouses with full basements, which back on to National Capital Commission parkland, great for leisurely strolls! It is situated within walking distance of a shopping mall and a community center, with transportation directly in front of the community. In 2019, the Ashgrove community expanded with the addition of 16 homes.

This community is located across the street from Billings Bridge Plaza, close to the Rideau River, walking paths and the Billings Bridge Transit station. It has an on site Community Room and is the home of the South District OCH office.

This community is located within walking distance to a large grocery store, and to shops and services on Rideau Street and in the Byward Market. Beauséjour is close to the Lowertown Community Resource Centre, Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, a Youth Centre and a Community House which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area. Several accessible units.

This community is located within walking distance to a large grocery store and to shops and services on Rideau Street and in the Byward Market. The community is close to the Lowertown Community Resource Centre, Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, a youth centre and Good Neighbours Community House which offer programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area.

Bellevue Manor is beside the Caldwell community and is in an established neighbourhood close to excellent shopping and within walking distance to the Experimental Farm, a City of Ottawa gymnasium and wading pool. A variety of programs and services are available on site at the Caldwell Family Centre, Bellevue Community Centre and at the StrongHold Community Home (Carlington Community Chaplaincy). The community is also close to Duluth Arena and Carlington Park.

properties.Image: Images/Located within a block of Elgin Street, the Blair House community offers seniors a very central location with easy access to stores and services. There is a large common room with a kitchen available for parties, meetings, and everyday socializing. Adjacent garden space is also available for social gatherings and meetings. The outdoor space includes a roof top terrace with a pergola.
properties.Description: Located within a block of Elgin Street, the Blair House community offers seniors a very central location with easy access to stores and services. There is a large common room with a kitchen available for parties, meetings, and everyday socializing. Adjacent garden space is also available for social gatherings and meetings. The outdoor space includes a roof top terrace with a pergola.
Located in the trendy Hintonburg area, these spacious and bright apartments include hardwood floors, large kitchens and access to a shared patio area.

The Britannia Woods community is situated close to Britannia Park and the Ottawa River. A children’s playground and extensive green space surround the community. A Community House is located in a converted four-bedroom townhouse at 9-115 Ritchie Street and offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the community.
These spacious apartments are located close to all the shops and services on Somerset Street. The community is within walking distance to the McNabb Community Centre and the downtown core.
With a small park adjacent to the site, this community provides a wonderful home for families with children, all within steps of the Byward Market.

Located in Overbrook, this development includes a wide variety of unit designs. Some units offer carports; all have basement storage space and backyards. The community is within walking distance to St. Laurent Shopping Centre, shops on Coventry Road and schools. Several accessible units.

Cameron Court is a wonderful townhouse community for families. It is situated in the Hunt Club area, with schools, parks, and recreational facilities all close by. Several accessible units; fridge and stove are included in these units only.
Located in Ottawa East near la Cité Collégiale, this development combines two sites; both are located near shopping, schools and green space.
Located in Ottawa East near la Cité Collégiale, this development combines two sites; both are located near shopping, schools and green space.

This seniors’ community is located at the corner of Rideau and Charlotte Street, just west of the Rideau River. Stores are close by on Rideau Street; a short bus ride takes you to the Rideau Centre and Byward Market. There is a convenient bus stop location in front of the building. There is also a seniors’ resource centre located in the building and a Community House nearby which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area.

Located one block south of Billings Bridge, this seniors’ community is in a quiet, tree-filled neighbourhood close to the Rideau River recreational path and public transportation. There are numerous shops and services close by at Billings Bridge Plaza. The community has a large ground floor lounge and outdoor patio space.

This community is situated close to the Rideau River and in the heart of the vibrant and historic New Edinburgh area. Stores, restaurants and public transportation are within easy walking distance. The light filled apartments feature open living spaces, hardwood floors, modern kitchens and ample storage. One accessible unit.

Debra Dynes offers an award winning Community House with an intensive array of programs and services. The community has large open park areas and is close to Mooney’s Bay, Hog’s Back and Vincent Massey Park. Shopping centres, bus routes and the Boy’s and Girl’s Club are also close by. The community is adjacent to a City operated playground with a wading pool (summer) and a skating rink (winter).

Situated in the heart of Overbrook, this community has many amenities nearby including a supermarket and stores on McArthur Road. It is just steps from a bus stop and a quick and easy bus ride to shopping and restaurants at St. Laurent Shopping Centre.
The Esson Place community is located in the Hunt Club area with vast greenspace, parks and schools all close by. It is a wonderful neighbourhood for families with children. Several accessible units.
This long-established townhouse development is located within walking distance of shopping, parks and schools. Perfect for families of all ages. Several accessible units.
Situated in the Golden Triangle, adjacent to the scenic Rideau Canal and its pathways, these bright and spacious apartments are also within walking distance to schools, shops and services.

The community is conveniently located at the north edge of Vanier, one block away from the shops on Beechwood and within walking distance to the New Edinburgh Park or the river. It is a short bus ride to the St. Laurent Community Centre or the Vanier Community Service Centre on Montreal Rd.

This community is located on the south side of Montreal Road, between the Vanier Parkway and St. Laurent Boulevard. It is conveniently located close to stores along Montreal Road or by bus to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre and the Vanier Community Centre. The five bachelor apartments are accessible units.

Located in the quiet neighbourhood of Dow’s Lake, this community is within walking distance to all the shops, services and restaurants on Preston Street. The apartments feature hardwood floors and a rooftop terrace. Two accessible units.

Heather Manor is close to a City park with recreation facilities. It is situated within the large townhouse communities of Albion Gardens and Albion Heatherington. Heather Manor includes an on site community room and outdoor patio.

Located close to the Experimental Farm, this community is within walking distance to all the shops and services at the Westgate Shopping Mall and to Carlington Community and Health Services. It is a short bus ride to the Merivale Road shopping district.
This townhouse development is located in the Hunt Club area, within walking distance of shopping, parks and schools. A wonderful place to raise a family. Several accessible units.

The King Edward community is centrally-located, in close proximity to the Byward Market and offers many shopping, recreational and business amenities, all within walking distance. Coin-operated laundry room and individual lockers are on the premises.

This family townhouse community is located in the Hunt Club area with vast parkland, bicycle paths and a variety of recreational activities. A wonderful neighbourhood for families with children. Several accessible units.

Located one block west of Merivale Road and Kirkwood Avenue, these two five-storey buildings are joined by a common lounge and outdoor patio. This community is close to Carlington Park, bus routes and Hampton Park Plaza and Westgate Shopping Centre.

The Loretta Young community is located in a quiet residential neighborhood, not far from Dow’s Lake, with schools, parks and shopping nearby. The three bedroom units have garages. This community provides a wonderful home for families with children within steps of Ottawa’s Italian district. Two one-bedroom accessible units.

MacDonald Manor has two large penthouse community rooms and is located close to shops and restaurants on Rideau Street. It is within walking distance to Le Patro Community Centre with an indoor pool, and is located next to a park. A short bus ride will take you to the Rideau Centre and the Byward Market. There is a Community House nearby which offers programs and services to all OCH tenants in the Lowertown area.

Residents of Marion Dewar Place enjoy convenient living in downtown Ottawa with a variety of restaurants, entertainment, shopping and other services at their doorstep. A community room and a bicycle storage room are on site. Several accessible units.

The May Nickson Place community features a small number of stacked townhouses adjacent to a modern apartment building in a downtown residential neighbourhood. Situated in the heart of Centretown, this community’s location provides easy access to shops, services, recreation facilities and buses. Several accessible units.

Located close to Lincoln Heights Mall, other stores and mini-malls on Richmond Road, this seniors’ community has a bus stop at its front door. It’s located just a short distance from the Ottawa River Parkway and the Pinecrest-Queensway Community Health Center. McEwen Terrace has a common lounge and beautiful scenery from the patio.

The McAuley Place community features a small number of townhouses surrounding an apartment building. Situated in the heart of downtown Ottawa, this community’s location provides easy access to shops, services, recreation facilities, buses and the main branch of the Ottawa Public Library.
McAuley-Place-Centretown-large.jpg

This community is located in Vanier, north of Montreal Road, between the Vanier Parkway and St. Laurent Boulevard. It is close to stores and restaurants on Montreal Road; a short bus ride to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre or the St. Laurent Community Centre.
Montfort-Fatima-Place-Village-Vanier-large.jpg

Morrison Gardens is a lovely family community located adjacent to a City of Ottawa park with a wading pool, tennis and basketball courts, and a playground. The community is within walking distance to Pinecrest Shopping Centre and close to Bayshore Shopping Centre. Five-bedroom unit is available.

Morrison Gardens is a lovely family community located adjacent to a City of Ottawa park with a wading pool, tennis and basketball courts, and a playground. The community is within walking distance to Pinecrest Shopping Centre and close to Bayshore Shopping Centre. Five-bedroom unit is available.

Located adjacent to the scenic Ottawa River Parkway, this community is close to the shops and services at Lincoln Heights Galleria and to the Pinecrest-Queensway Community Health Centre. It is a short bus ride to Westboro, the Bayshore Shopping Centre and the Carlingwood Shopping Centre. Two two-bedroom accessible units.

Located in Overbrook, these single family units are within walking distance to St. Laurent Shopping Centre, parks and schools. Rents for homes without subsidies are extremely affordable. Families with dependent children are given priority.

This community is located in Kanata, north of the Queensway in a residential area with many amenities close by including shopping, buses and restaurants. The area boasts extensive greenspace. Penfield has an on site community room.
Pinecrest Terrace is located close to schools, playgrounds, shopping centres and Algonquin College. A Community House is located on site and offers programs and services to tenants.
Pinecrest Terrace is located close to schools, playgrounds, shopping centres and Algonquin College. A Community House is located on site and offers programs and services to tenants.

Ramsey is located adjacent to the Foster Farm community, a mini-mall, a baseball diamond and a Boys and Girls Club. The community is within walking distance to Pinecrest Mall. There is an on site City of Ottawa Community Centre, Daycare Centre and a Family House. Several accessible units.

Located in the Hunt Club area, this community offers both stacked and regular townhouses. With schools, bicycle paths, and parks close by, this is the perfect place for families with children. Three accessible units.
This community features 15 three-bedroom homes, providing much-needed affordable housing for families. A green space and a playground are a part of the revitalized community.

The community is within walking distance to a City of Ottawa indoor pool and a park with a wading pool. A Community House is located on site and offers programs and services to tenants. Excellent shopping and schools are all nearby.

The community is within walking distance to a City of Ottawa indoor pool and a park with a wading pool. A Community House is located on site and offers programs and services to tenants. Excellent shopping and schools are all nearby.

This community features charming townhouses that are spacious with an abundance of counter and cupboard space. Most of the townhouses have private fenced backyards. There is a community space and a tot lot on site. The community is located close to all the great restaurants of the Italian and Asian districts.
Ron-Kolbus-place-townhouses-west-centre-town-large.jpg
Ron-Kolbus-place-townhouses-west-centre-town-large.jpg

Russell Gardens is located on the west side of Russell Road, east of St. Laurent Boulevard. The community is close to public transportation and shopping malls. There is a community room in each building
Russell Manor is located west of St. Laurent, one block north of Smyth Road. The community is close to the Dempsey Community Centre. There is a community room located on the ground floor.
The community is within walking distance to the Westboro shopping and restaurant district. The townhouses have finished basements and powder rooms. There is an on site play structure.

These multi-level townhouses, located in the popular Ottawa south Uplands area, have large decks and individual carports. The townhouses surround a central play area including a log cabin community building which was donated by the National Capital Commission. Accessible units available.

Located in the Carlington area, this community is close to shops and services at the Westgate Shopping Mall and on Merivale Road. The Alexander Community Centre, Carlington Community and Health Services, City of Ottawa park and the Experimental Farm are all close by.

380 Somerset is in the heart of Centretown with stores, restaurants, theatres and public transportation within walking distance. The apartments are bright and spacious with hardwood floors, ceiling fans, French balconies, modern kitchens and ample en-suite storage. A bicycle storage room located at 415 MacLaren Street is available to 380 Somerset tenants. There is a community room in the building and a beautifully landscaped outside terrace shared with the MacLaren Towers community. Accessible units available.

The Somerset Rooming House is located next door to the Sandy Hill Community Centre, it is a short walk from this community to Strathcona Park and the University of Ottawa campus. Rooms are furnished and include cooking facilities. It is a great location with affordable rents for university students!

Located north of Montreal Road, on St. Laurent Boulevard, this seven-storey apartment building is within walking distance to shopping, restaurants and recreational facilities. Several one-bedroom accessible units.

The community is located on the west side of St. Laurent Boulevard, halfway between the Queensway and Montreal Road. It is a short bus ride to the St. Laurent Shopping Centre and within walking distance to the St. Laurent Community Centre.

The Strathcona Heights-Apartments’ community is located in Sandy Hill, within walking distance of Strathcona Park and the Rideau River. The Parent Resource Centre, located at 300 Goulburn Private, offers a multitude of programs and services to households with children within the city. There are several on-site parks with play structures. Accessible units available.
Strathcona-Heights-apartments-Sandy-Hill-large.jpg
Tapiola-Court-Hunt-Club-large.jpg
The Vachon Place community is located in Mechanicsville. These apartments are within walking distance to the Parkdale Market, numerous shops, restaurants, parks, and the Hintonburg Community Centre.

Combining a mixture of apartment and bungalow housing, the Walkley Road community is situated in close proximity to shops, services and public transportation. Located on the south side of Walkley Road, the community includes a large lounge and outdoor patio space with swings. Programs and health services are available close by at the Heron Seniors’ Centre.

This community has multi-level townhouses which are within walking distance to a shopping mall, numerous parks and restaurants, schools and the Pinecrest-Queensway Community and Health Centre. There is also an on site Community House which provides an assortment of programs and services to the community. Accessible units available.
